'''House Grayson''' is an extinct vassal house from [[the North]] of [[Westeros]], holding allegiance to [[House Stark]] of [[Winterfell]]. They are mentioned briefly in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]'', to which they are unique.
sections.In the books: Unlike the Forresters and [[House Whitehill|Whitehills]], House Grayson seems to be purely an invention of Telltale, much like Houses [[House Branfield|Branfield]] and [[House Glenmore|Glenmore]]. The same is true for their allies, Houses Elliver and Brownbarrow.
sections.History:
===Background===
The Graysons were loyal Stark bannermen, and prominent allies of [[House Forrester]] of [[Ironrath]]. They fought alongside the Forresters for [[Robb Stark]] in the [[War of the Five Kings]].
==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
During a meeting of Ironrath's small council, [[Rodrik Forrester|Lord Rodrik Forrester]] may ask about the state of House Forrester's allies. [[Duncan Tuttle]] responds that House Grayson, along with Houses [[House Elliver|Elliver]] and [[House Brownbarrow|Brownbarrow]], were wiped out at the [[Red Wedding]].
